data.title: USD to NIO: Convert US Dollars to Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros
data.meta_description: Use the USD to NIO currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert US Dollars to Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about USD to NIO

How much is 1 US Dollar in Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros?

1 US Dollar = 36.673 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros as of August 17, 2024 10:55 PM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between US Dollars and Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 US Dollars in Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros?

As of August 17, 2024 10:55 PM UTC, 100 US Dollars is equivalent to 3,667.26 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros. The exchange rate at this time is 36.673 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros per US Dollar.

What was the highest USD to NIO exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from US Dollars to Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros was on April 19, 2024 when each US Dollar was worth 36.960 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros.

When is the best time to convert USD to NIO?

The USD and NIO can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert US Dollars to Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert US Dollars to Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros early in the week if you need NIO urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the US Dollar or the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro, as 1 USD is equal to 36.673 NIO. Conversely, 1 NIO is worth 0.02727 USD.

Is the US Dollar up or down against the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro?

The US Dollar has decreased -0.08% year-to-date against the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro. Over the past 10 years, the US Dollar has appreciated +37.88% against the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro. Consequently, the US Dollar has gained purchasing power compared to the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro over the last decade.

What's the best USD to NIO exchange rate today?

As of August 17, 2024 10:55 PM UTC, the best USD to NIO exchange rate is 36.673 NIO. This means that for every US Dollar you exchange, you will receive 36.673 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros.
